amendatorysection.catchline: Board of examiners; office space; equipment; meetings.
amendatorysection.para: The board of examiners shall be furnished necessary office space, furniture, equipment, stationery, and clerical assistance by the Department of Roads. The board shall organize itself by selecting from among its members a chairperson and such other officers as it may find desirable. The board shall meet at such times at the Department of Roads headquarters in Lincoln as may be necessary for the administration of the County Highway and City Street Superintendents Act.
